# send(_:completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Sends a WebSocket message, receiving the result in a completion handler.

## Declaration

```swift
@preconcurrency func send(_ message: URLSessionWebSocketTask.Message, completionHandler: @escaping ((any Error)?) -> Void)
```

## Parameters

- **message**: The WebSocket message to send to the other endpoint.
- **completionHandler**: A closure that receives an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSError] that indicates an error encountered while sending, or nil if no error occurred.

## Discussion

If an error occurs while sending the message, any outstanding work also fails.

## Sending and receiving data

- **URLSessionWebSocketTask.Message**: An enumeration of the types of messages sent and received.
- **receive(completionHandler:)**: Reads a WebSocket message once all the frames of the message are available.
- **maximumMessageSize**: The maximum number of bytes to buffer before the receive call fails with an error.
